scripts.video: ffmpeg -framerate 12 -i dist/frames/frame_%d.png -i assets/drumy_104_v4.wav -vf "scale=-1:1080:force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,pad=1920:1080:(ow-iw)/2:(oh-ih)/2:black" -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -pix_fmt yuv420p f.mp4
